(Well, we'll just se about that... The Alliance will fall, or at least hit 
the ground really hard:p Too much nonsleep^_^ I won't be home this weekend, 
but I'll try to post again this afternoon before I leave. Happy Holidays!)

Hysteria/Tavatron/Rion

Hysteria rolled to the left this time, and caughtthe tail end of 
Obliteratron's attack. She let out a yelp as she became airborne, and landed 
several yads closer to the CF. This wasn't going to work. She wasn't capable 
of damaging Obliteratron! Hysteria watched as the shields fluctated, they 
wouldn't hold much longer. She ran across the plains and inside the CF, 
skidding across the floor as she made her way to (wherever Chordate is):

<to Chordate>"What's our status?"

*****

Tavatron flipped forward this time, over Scattershot's weapon's fire. She 
couldn't keep doing this, there had to be someway to take out that flying 
slag! She sent to waves of energy at him, one from each end of the staff. 
The first was aimed at his head, the second at his propulsion system.

*****

Rion fell to the ground with a loud *thud*. He lay there for a moment, 
catching his breath. He was so glad to see her! He couldn't believe it! She 
was here, now, on the planet!!

"I'm *gasp* glad to see you too!"

He climbed to his feet, balanced, and looked at Diana with that little hint 
of mischief in his eyes that meant he was up to something. He ran at Diana, 
and playfully tried to tackle her, like they used to do when they were 
supposed to be practicing basic self-defense:

"Betcha can't pin me!"

>Scattershot flew forward, firing off twenty-five explosive rounds at
>Tavatron, the energy blast striking him in the left side.  He slowly
>descended, but his mind clicked, and he ignored the pain because he was
>psychotic.
>
